column4: does anyone know how to fix the slow networking problem?  i disabled ipv6, still takes 20 secs to get a web page to come up
you sure ipv6 has been disabled ?? do lsmod | grep ip     to be sure
i'm in debian-side ATM but i renamed ipv6.ko and rebooted
your debina box is working ok ?
sure there is.  Pause pauses in the middle of a song, Stop stops playing a song.
the end result of the action is the music stops ....pause allows you to resume ....stop does not :)
and what happens when i press play again?
all you have to do is cleick the next song you want to play
well, that's odd, because i expected it to Stop, therefore pressing play again should start from the beginning.
either drag the slider back to the start of the song or double click it
it's possible, i'm simply pointing out that it's a stupid design decision
